item.title: House pricing in Belo Horizonte
item.description: The goal of this notes is to have some information on the house prices in Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brazil. The plan is: Clean and visualize the Data in order to obtain some initial information If possible, apply ML algorithms in the data in order to predict the prices Obtain some conclusions in what makes the prices higher. Latitude x Longitude with a mapcolor representing the house price in Belo Horizonte, see more below.
